:py:mod:`pyslam.demos.monocular_capture`
========================================

.. py:module:: pyslam.demos.monocular_capture

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This demo takes in the file name of a video
   camera, and visualizes 5 frames from the camera,
   using the Monocular File Camera Sensor to get the
   images



Submodules
----------
.. toctree::
   :titlesonly:
   :maxdepth: 1

   monocular_capture/index.rst
